landing.noapp: Awudingi uhlelo lokusebenza ukusebenzisa i-{{ BRAND }} efonini noma kuthebhulethi yakho! Iwebhusayithi isebenza kahle kumakhalekhukhwini.
landing.intro: {{BRAND}} ({{TRANSLITERATION}}) iyindlela enhle yokuhlangana nabangane abasha. Uma usebenzisa i-{{ BRAND }}, sikhetha omunye umuntu ngokungahleliwe futhi sikuvumela ukuthi ukhulume ubuso nobuso. Ukukusiza ukuthi uhlale uphephile, izingxoxo aziziwa ngaphandle kwalapho utshela othile ukuthi ungubani (akunconyiwe!), futhi ungamisa ingxoxo noma nini. Bona <6>Imigomo nemibandela</6> yethu, kanye <8>nemihlahlandlela yomphakathi</8> ukuze uthole ulwazi mayelana nokufanele ukwenze nokungafanele usebenzisa i-{{ BRAND }}. Ingxoxo yevidiyo ye-{{ BRAND }} ilinganiselwe nge-AI kodwa akukho ukulinganisela okuhle. Abasebenzisi banesibopho kuphela ngokuziphatha kwabo ngenkathi besebenzisa i-{{ BRAND }}
landing.disclaimer: <0>Kufanele ube neminyaka engu-18 (noma iningi elisemthethweni endaweni yakho) noma ngaphezulu ukuze usebenzise {{BRAND}}</0>. Bona <4>Imigomo nemibandela</4> ka-{{BRAND}} ukuze uthole ulwazi olwengeziwe. Izivikelo zokulawula zabazali ezingase zisize abazali batholakale ngokwezentengiso futhi ungathola ulwazi olwengeziwe kokuthi <6>https://www.connectsafely.org/controls</6> kanye namanye amasayithi.
landing.pleaseleave: Sicela ushiye e-Lamdazle futhi uvakashele isayithi yabantu abadala uma kuyilokho okufunayo futhi uneminyaka engu-18 (noma iningi elisemthethweni endaweni yakho) noma ngaphezulu.
landing.termscheck: Ngokuqoka ibhokisi uyavuma ukuthi ubuyekeze ukuvuma ukuboshwa <3>Imigomo nemibandela</3> ye-{{BRAND}}, <5>Inqubomgomo Yobumfihlo</5> kanye <7>Nomphakathi. imihlahlandlela</7>.
landing.agecheck: Akumele usebenzise le sevisi uma ungaphansi kweminyaka engu-18 noma uneminyaka yobudala yeningi elisemthethweni endaweni yakho. Bona <1>Imigomo nemibandela</1> yethu ukuze uthole ulwazi olwengeziwe. <3>Ngokukhetha ibhokisi uyavuma futhi umela ukuthi uneminyaka engu-18 (noma iningi elisemthethweni endaweni yakho) noma ngaphezulu.</3>

chat.error: Iphutha ekuxhumekeni kuseva: Sicela uzame futhi

search.retry: Lokhu kuthatha isikhathi eside, ukufuna umuntu ongamazi esikhundleni...

chat.connected: Uxoxa nomuntu ongamazi nje. Ithi Sawubona...
chat.language: Nobabili nikhuluma ulimi olufanayo. Khetha okuthi {"4ny"} kumenyu yolimi ukuze uyikhubaze.
chat.simulated: Umuntu ongamazi kungenzeka usebenzisa ikhamera yewebhu elingisiwe

alerts.keepclean: Kugcine kuhlanzekile futhi usize ngokubika ukuziphatha kwe-NSFW
alerts.banreason: Ngenxa yokuziphatha okubi. Ungakhathazeki, ukuvinjelwa ngeke kuhlale unomphela.
